titleStmt.title: Die Sabbathi, 8. Julii, 1648. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that thankes be given to almighty God, tomorrow, the ninth of this instant July, in all the churches and chappels within the late lines of communication, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Signed: H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
